mapper.select:
select idx as idx, title as title, content as content, board_no as boardNo, writer as writer, reg_date as regDate, upt_date as uptDate from simpleboard where 1=1
and idx = #{idx}
and title like CONCAT('%', #{sch_title}, '%')
and content like CONCAT('%', #{sch_content}, '%')
and writer like CONCAT('%', #{sch_writer}, '%')
and #{sch_startDate} <= DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{sch_endDate}
mapper.insert:
select concat('B', lpad(ifnull(max(idx),0)+1, 4, '0')) as boardNo, ifnull(max(idx),0) + 1 as idx from simpleboard
insert simpleboard( idx, title, content, board_no, writer, reg_date ) values ( #{idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{boardNo}, #{writer}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: update simpleboard set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, upt_date = sysdate() where idx = #{idx}
